title: [Bug]: FATAL:setuid_sandbox_host.cc
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

setting permissions properly

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.12.7

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. try launching the app in either app or terminal
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. just open
```

### Debug

```markdown
bean@bean-82fe:~$ teams-for-linux 
[14817:0317/211910.791195:FATAL:setuid_sandbox_host.cc(163)] The SUID sandbox helper binary was found, but is not configured correctly. Rather than run without sandboxing I'm aborting now. You need to make sure that /opt/teams-for-linux/chrome-sandbox is owned by root and has mode 4755.
Trace/breakpoint trap (core dumped)



just a suggestion, please add these commands to fix the issue, some people may not know about these steps to fix this

sudo chown root:root /opt/teams-for-linux/chrome-sandbox
sudo chmod 4755 /opt/teams-for-linux/chrome-sandbox

after using the commands above will make the app work normally
```

### Additional context

_No response_
